title: Knowing to learn
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Marcel Martin and Claude Jutra
brief_description: A far-ranging round-up of all that is new in technology in the classrooms of North America, demonstrating, among other approaches, the new roles of computer, tape recorder and television in the learning process. The film was produced with the assistance of many institutions and individuals in the United States engaged in experiment and research into all forms of education from infancy to adulthood.
